roadmapItems.title: Robot Operating System (ROS) for Engineers
roadmapItems.description: Hands-on introduction to building robotic applications with ROS, from simulation to real-world deployment. Bridges the gap between research and prototyping.

learningGoals: My goal is to become a versatile and reliable engineer, capable of improving real world systems.
To contribute to open source robotics and R&D projects.
To develop solutions that are practical, efficient, and well executed, while continuing to grow my skills to stay at the forefront of technologies.
